trans-unit.source: A client/server environment is an environment in which multiple applications connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> over the network.

seg-source.mrk: A client/server environment is an environment in which multiple applications connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> over the network.

target.mrk: A client/server environment is an environment in which multiple applications connect to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> over the network.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs embedded in a server framework that allows multiple network connections. (The framework itself starts an instance of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> and runs in an embedded environment. However, the client applications do not run in the embedded environment.)

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs embedded in a server framework that allows multiple network connections.
(The framework itself starts an instance of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> and runs in an embedded environment.
However, the client applications do not run in the embedded environment.)

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs embedded in a server framework that allows multiple network connections.
(The framework itself starts an instance of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> and runs in an embedded environment.
However, the client applications do not run in the embedded environment.)

trans-unit.source: You can also embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in any Java server framework.

seg-source.mrk: You can also embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in any Java server framework.

target.mrk: You can also embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in any Java server framework.

trans-unit.source: See the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph></cite> for more information on how to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> on a server.

seg-source.mrk: See the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph></cite> for more information on how to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> on a server.

target.mrk: See the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph></cite> for more information on how to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> on a server.
